item.title: Blocked Drain, 21st September
item.description:

item.title: Flood clyde road, 20th September
item.description:
Outside number 11 Clyde road, opposite number 15 Clyde road, along the road of Riverside cottages. On the corner of 2 Clyde road. All drains have not been cleared and is full of plants leaves , with the amount of water 3 property were nearly flooded and 4 cars .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Riverside Cottages, Brockworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Street light on high pavement and street light on road which lights up the sign for the ford are out., 20th September
item.description:
The street light on high pavement making it dangerous to walk at dusk/night and the street light on road at same area which lights up the sign warning that you are driving into a ford are both not working. The other street lights and residential homes all had their lights on so it was not an electrical fault due to the storm.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43, School Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: General road marking and stud issues

item.title: Blocked drains resulting in road flooding, 20th September
item.description:
The drain on the corner of Bath Road and Bath Parade and the two opposite on Bath Road were blocked. The road flooded, causing traffic problems, and residents had to put out sandbags to prevent property flooding. Issues with the drains have been reported numerous times over the last two years, with no action being taken.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 41, Bath Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
